mapper.delete:
delete from cus_week_report where id in
#{id}
mapper.select: select COUNT(aa.assoc_id) from (select concat(',',group_concat(`a`.`user_id` separator ','),',') AS user_id , a.`assoc_id`, a.sign from cus_user_assoc a where assoc_type='WEEK_REPORT_TARGET' GROUP BY a.`assoc_id`,sign ) aa where aa.user_id like CONCAT('%',CONCAT(',',#{beSentPeopleId},','),'%') and aa.assoc_id in (select id from cus_week_report where status!=146) and aa.sign is null

select a.`id` as id, a.`com_content` as comContent , a.`content_sum`as contentSum , a.`content_plan`as contentPlan , a.`description`as description , a.`start_time`as startTime , a.`end_time`as endTime , a.`create_by`as createBy , a.`create_time`as createTime , a.`update_by`as updateBy , a.`update_time`as updateTime , a.`del_flag`as delFlag , a.`status`as status , b.name as createByName, b.dept_id as deptId, c.name as deptName from cus_week_report a LEFT JOIN sys_user b on a.create_by =b.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_dept c on b.dept_id =c.dept_id WHERE a.id=#{id}

select count(a.id) from ( select id, create_by as createBy, date_format(start_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as startTime, date_format(end_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as endTime from cus_week_report )a
and a.startTime = #{startTimeOfMonday} and a.endTime = #{endTimeOfSunday} and a.createBy = #{createBy}
